{"id":806841028,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"7 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1663940455,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"354 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/806841028/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"41.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int concatenatedBinary(int n) {\n        int modulo = 1000000007;\n        \n        long ans =0;\n        for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){\n            ans = (((ans<<(1+(int)(Math.log(i) / Math.log(2))))%modulo)+i)%modulo;\n        }\n        return (int)ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers","has_notes":false}
